title: Breakdown of the Department of Homeland Security budget by organization 2020
yAxis: Budget authority in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.
Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has the highest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars and Office of Inspector General has the lowest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars.
The difference of Budget authority in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Organisation is 28538.63.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Organisation in the x axis and Budget authority in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Budget authority in million U.S. dollars for 14 number of Organisations.

The maximum Budget authority in million U.S. dollars 28708.82 is found at Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency and the minimum is found at Office of Inspector General where Organisation is 170.19.
Organisation U.S. Customs and Border Protection has the second highest value for Budget authority in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has 28538.63 more Budget authority in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Organisation Office of Inspector General.

The Organisation Federal Emergency Management Agency has the highest Budget authority in million U.S. dollars, followed by U.S. Customs and Border Protection, and U.S. Coast Guard. Down to the Organisation Office of Inspector General which is the lowest.
The lowest value 170.19 at Office of Inspector General is almost 4.37 times smaller than the average value 6576.97.
